rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Torigo Base very full of refugees
from Acedia now!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Popipii can not just sit by and
watch tragic drama unfold!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0003
rows.name:
So Popipii ask Mamapon to donate
to refugee supporting for Popipii!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0004
rows.name:
Popipii think make plenty support
money if selling all works of art in
Popipii's room. Have big collection!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, but artworks of Bahn-sama probably
not sell for very much...
